name.value: Pro Cycling Manager Season 2006: Le Tour de France

item.description:
Pro Cycling Manager is a sport management game dedicated to cyclism, mixing tactical experience and strategy. Playing a sport director, you have to manage, plan, and organize the life of a professional team on one season or more, and mainly have an impact on its results in the various races in real time and 3D graphics. In the races, you will have to ask your riders to manage their energy, to get some fresh water and food, to attack at the right moment, to protect your leader, to keep an eye on your competitors or to launch sprints… You will the discover all the tactical subtleties of professional cycling!

Pro Cycling Manager 2006 offers you to run in the greatest international events in cycling. In this new edition, well-known teams as Jan Ullrich’s “T-Mobile” are completing an already big pack of 50 official teams (for example: Bouygues Telecom, Cofidis, Crédit Agricole, Davitamon Lotto, Euskaltel, Française des Jeux, Quickstep, Rabobank, Team CSC, Lampre, Liberty Seguros, AG2r Prévoyance, Caise d’épargne Iles Baléares, among others!).

Pro Cycling Manager 2006 benefits for the first time of the prestigious licence “Tour de France” and offers races such as: Paris-Nice, Paris-Roubaix, La Fleche Wallone, Liège-Bastogne-Liège, Paris-Tours, le Critérium international, le Tour de Picardie, le Tour de l’avenir, and so one… Thus season 2006 is full of great events for Pro Cycling manager’s fans with 400 stages!

Source: The Developer Website.
